body_html: My specific use case for wanting Python 3.6 is because our codebase extensively uses PEP 526 Variable Annotations and Python 3.5.2 in the current docker images chokes on the syntax. I'd like to be able to use the official TF docker images for running continuous integration tests..
body_text: My specific use case for wanting Python 3.6 is because our codebase extensively uses PEP 526 Variable Annotations and Python 3.5.2 in the current docker images chokes on the syntax.  I'd like to be able to use the official TF docker images for running continuous integration tests..
body: My specific use case for wanting Python 3.6 is because our codebase extensively uses [PEP 526 Variable Annotations](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0526) and Python 3.5.2 in the current docker images chokes on the syntax.  I'd like to be able to use the official TF docker images for running continuous integration tests..
